Core¶

block.js¶

class Header(constructor)¶

Represents the block header structure

Arguments:
  • previousHash (Array.<String>) –
  • state (Object) – state of the block producer’s account
  • txHash (String) – all transactions’ hash value
  • difficulty (Number) –
  • number (Number) –
  • timestamp (Number) –
  • nonce (Number) –
  • checkpoint (Object) – Operator’s receipt about previous block, 꼭 직전의 블록일 이유는 없음.
class Block(constructor)¶

Represents the block structure

Arguments:
  • header (Header) – this block’s header
  • signatures (Array.<Signature>) – list of signature
  • transactions (Array.<Transaction>) – list of txs

transactions.js¶

class Transaction(constructor)¶

Transaction

Arguments:
  • type (string) – ‘send’ or ‘receive’
  • accountNonce (number) –
  • recipient (address) –
  • sender (address) –
  • value (number) –
Transaction.hash()¶

Returns and saves hash value of tx data, exclude signature information

blockchain.js¶

class Blockchain(constructor)¶

Represents the Blockchain structure

Arguments:
  • db (Database) – block db
  • address (Address) – this blockchain’s owner
Blockchain.checkpoints¶

final checkpoint got receipt from operator

Blockchain.getBlock(hash, number)¶

Returns the block matching hash value or number. 나중에 header chain 집어 넣었을 때 필요.

Arguments:
  • hash (String) –
  • number (Number) –
Blockchain.getBlockByNumber(number)¶

Returns the block with block number

Arguments:
  • number (Number) –
Blockchain.getCurrentBlock()¶

Returns current block of this blockchain

Blockchain.insertBlock(block)¶

Injects a new head block into the current block chain. This method assumes that the block is indeed a true head.

Arguments:
  • block (Block) –
Blockchain.updateCheckpoint(checkpoint)¶

Updates a new checkpoint received from operator

Arguments:
  • checkpoint (Object) –
